set2Desc\n: string: Increased power when attacking from the front or rear of the target.
Increased critical chance when character's health is above 80% or below 20%.

Gain the "Expert" buff when landing a critical hit. Expert - If the Expert buff reaches 3 stacks, the next skill is guaranteed to land a critical hit, with increased critical damage. Consumes the "Expert" buff.
Gain Vigor buff with each successful hit. Attack power increases per stack. Reset upon being hit.
Increased power of skills that restore resources.
Power increases proportionally to the Adventurer's number of granted buff.
set4Desc\n: string: Increased Critical Chance when attacking from the front or rear of the target.
Increased Power when character's health is above 80% or below 20%.
Increased Power proportionally to Expert Buff count
Increased power of skills that consume resources.
Power increases proportionally to the target's number of granted DeBuff.
